name: AtomInstallScripts
description: Adam's environment setup for Atom editor

scripts.packages-basic: npm run atom-beautify && npm run file-icons && npm run pigments
scripts.packages-advanced: npm run angularjs && npm run atom-ng-attr-hint && npm run atom-typescript && npm run language-html-angular && npm run linter && npm run linter-htmlhint && npm run linter-lesshint && npm run minimap
scripts.themes: npm run patternfly-syntax && npm run patternfly-ui
scripts.all: npm run packages-basic && npm run packages-advanced && npm run themes

author: Adam J. Jolicoeur
